snippet: The former M.V.P. Josh Hamilton, a recovering drug addict, apologized for a “weak moment” that started with a few drinks in a Dallas-area bar.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Texas Rangers outfielder Josh Hamilton, a recovering drug addict, says he had a relapse with alcohol but that he intends to make sure it does not happen again; other baseball items noted.
lead_paragraph: The former M.V.P. Josh Hamilton, a recovering drug addict, apologized for a “weak moment” that started with a few drinks in a Dallas-area bar.

headline.seo: Rangers’ Hamilton Acknowledges an Alcohol Relapse
headline.main: Rangers’ Hamilton Admits to Alcohol Relapse
headline.print_headline: Rangers’ Hamilton Admits to Relapse With Alcohol
